definition[0]: a pay-as-you-go mobile phone or Internet service is one that you must pay for before you can use it
definition[1]: a pay-as-you-go arrangement is one in which a customer pays for a product or service as they use it, rather than paying the whole amount before or after receiving it
example[0]: PTI Environmental Service will conduct the study, which will be funded on apay-as-you-go basis.
